name: Impending Death
description:
Impending Death is a horror maze game made within 48 hours for the 2021 Nordic Game Jam. It is made by a one-man team (Unus Lupus).

The theme for this years Nordic GameJam was "Pending". The relevancy of the game to the theme is a feeling of impending doom that we intend to instill in the player, through a mixture of low light scenes, creepy music, and a few scary moments.

Main feature:
Randomly generated maze: The maze randomly generated every time you start or restart the game. No playthrough will ever be the same.
Flashlight: Your only lightsource in this game is your (un)trustworthy flashlight. However it may not be as dependable as you hope it will be..

3rd Party Assets:

AllSkyFree: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/allsky-free-10-s...
Mangled Screams: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/creatures/mangled-screams-f...
Footsteps - Essentials: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-essentials-...
Stone textures: https://gumroad.com/juliosillet
Music: Gminorscale aka. Daniel Nielsen
Fonts:
https://www.1001fonts.com/plasma-drip-font.html
https://www.1001fonts.com/ghastly-panic-font.html
